extensionIdentifier.files.includedFilePa: Glob patterns to include in the package. The default is ts, js, json, html, css, scss, less
extensionIdentifier.files.excludedFilePa: Glob patterns to exclude from the package. The default is node_modules, dist, out, build, and any hidden files
extensionIdentifier.files.includeFilePat: Show the path of the file in the name of the list of generated files
extensionIdentifier.generateFfgCommand: Generate File Forge Command for Open Files
